title: Recent negativity on the boards
body:
Hey guys, I have adopted the habit of reading the boards on here quite frequently over the last few months, and one thing that I have noticed is the hoards of negativity that have been hitting the boards here, now while I know that sometimes you need a place to vent (I have admittedly done this in the not so distant past), The boards aren't the place to do it, all you will get is people downvoting you or arguing with you. My suggestion, and how I have gotten through my rough patch of 'post game rage' is to listen to piano, or take a break and chat to some of my mates, but thats just me and there are hundreds of different things you can do to get over your 'noob team' or any other problem that has made you rage in league. Another thing, remember its just a video game, and in the end everything will even out. If you need someone to chat to, feel free to hit me up in game and ill add you, I'm on quite a lot so you'll probably see a me a lot. Cheers guys, have a good day.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
